name: Dream Wyrm: a Dragon Dad Dating Simulator
name_original: Dream Wyrm: a Dragon Dad Dating Simulator
description:
Nestor decides to tell Gavin how he feels.

---------

A fun test project made in a couple days for Valentine's Day. The idea was to build a VN framework but using 3D characters and stepped animation. With the advantage of being able to dynamically adjust lighting and blend poses and expressions, this has quite a lot of potential and I'm very happy with the result. If more dragons were to be added... :)
